column11: Temperature is average of diurnal and nocturnal values and is measured independently of BMR.
McNab averages the values at 20C and 25C.
McNab averages the two groups of wombats.  Temperature is given at 25C which is above, or close to the lower critical temperature.  Data is not quite ideal.
Tb under conditions of BMR measurement is stated to approximate 35-36C.
Value corrected.  McNab uses 1.25 rather than the reported 1.15.

It is unclear where to map Sciurus aberti as there are many Sciurus, but no obvious nearest relation.
